tool_description: Identifies content gaps and opportunities by analyzing existing content coverage in a specific topic area.

main_topic.description: Primary topic or niche to analyze for content gaps

error_messages: Invalid content depth: Use one of [surface, moderate, deep]
Invalid domain format: Ensure domains are properly formatted URLs
Empty main topic: Provide a specific topic to analyze
Too many competitors: Maximum 10 competitor domains allowed
usage: Specify main_topic and optionally competitor_domains and content_depth. Returns identified gaps and content opportunities.

content_gaps.description: Identified content gaps in the topic area

competition_level.description: Competition level for each gap: low, medium, high

estimated_difficulty.description: Content creation difficulty scores (1-10) for each gap
